structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: Any sewer construction district created in the manner provided in KRS 76.300 to 76.325 may, if the commissioners of such district deem it advisable, use the authority and procedures granted to sanitation districts by KRS 220.535 to 220.537 to annex territory to the district, "board of directors" being read as "commission."
